## Chess.move() method

Make a move on the board.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
move(move: string | Move, options: {
        sloppy?: boolean;
    }): Move | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  move | string \| [Move](./chess.js.move.md) | Case-sensitive SAN string or object, e.g. <code>'Nxb7'</code> or <code>{ from: 'h7', to: 'h8', promotion: 'q' }</code> |
|  options | { sloppy?: boolean; } | Options to enable parsing of a variety of non-standard move notations |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Move](./chess.js.move.md) \| null
